==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|けい|ざい|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
Possibly from {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=けいざい}} compound {{m|zh|輕罪|tr=khjieng dzwoj<sup>X</sup>|lit=light + crime, offense}}.

Alternatively, may have been coined in Japan of {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=けいざい}}-derived elements, as a compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=けいざい|軽|tr1=kei|t1=light|pos1=[[漢音#Japanese|kan'on]] reading|罪|tr2=zai|t2=crime, offense|pos2=[[呉音#Japanese|goon]] reading}}.
